mentors.name: Sarah Chen
mentors.bio: Senior ML Engineer at Google with 8 years of experience in deep learning and computer vision. Previously led AI initiatives at startups and Fortune 500 companies.

mentors.name: Marcus Rodriguez
mentors.bio: Lead Frontend Developer at Spotify with expertise in React ecosystem. Passionate about creating accessible and performant web applications.

mentors.name: Priya Patel
mentors.bio: Principal DevOps Engineer at Amazon Web Services. Expert in cloud infrastructure, automation, and helping teams achieve CI/CD excellence.

mentors.name: David Kim
mentors.bio: Cybersecurity Director at JPMorgan Chase with 12 years of experience in financial services security. CISSP certified with expertise in threat hunting.

mentors.name: Emily Johnson
mentors.bio: Senior Product Manager at Meta (Facebook) with 6 years of experience launching consumer products used by millions. Previously at LinkedIn and startup environments.

mentors.name: Alex Thompson
mentors.bio: Data Science Lead at Uber with focus on experimentation and causal inference. PhD in Statistics from Stanford, passionate about mentoring data professionals.

mentors.name: Jessica Liu
mentors.bio: Senior UX Designer at Adobe with expertise in design systems and user research. 7 years of experience creating intuitive experiences for creative professionals.

mentors.name: Robert Singh
mentors.bio: Cloud Solutions Architect at Microsoft Azure with 10 years of enterprise architecture experience. Helps organizations migrate to cloud-native solutions.

mentors.name: Lisa Wang
mentors.bio: VP of Product at Stripe with background in fintech and payments. Expert in data-driven product decisions and scaling product teams.

mentors.name: Michael Brown
mentors.bio: Security Engineer at Cloudflare specializing in infrastructure security and DevSecOps. Passionate about building security into the development lifecycle.
